title: Hide and Seek with Zog
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 279 words, Level F (Grade 1), Lexile 340L, Fiction Series
description: In this delightful Monsters story, a shy new monster moves in next door to Jupe. Despite Jupe's attempts to bring her out of her hiding places, Zog is just too shy. But when there's a knock on the door, a tea party waiting on the lawn, and a giggle coming from behind the bush, Zog overcomes her fears.
